phrases.text: Sao cô là cô mình mãi ư lửng lơ mà chưa có chồng (lửng lơ mà chưa có chồng)

culturalContext.description: This phrase features "chồng" - husband - central figure in many complaint songs about marriage difficulties. This narrative phrase advances the story, grounding the emotional content in concrete imagery. Courtship songs from Bắc Ninh province, sung alternately by men and women.
